statements: SELECT * FROM ticket_sales;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM ticket_sales WHERE purchase_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_email, purchase_date FROM ticket_sales WHERE customer_name = 'Alice';
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, purchase_amount FROM ticket_sales ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM ticket_sales WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC, purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_email, purchase_amount FROM ticket_sales WHERE purchase_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY purchase_amount ASC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM ticket_sales WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01' AND purchase_date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM ticket_sales WHERE customer_name <> 'Alice' ORDER BY customer_name ASC, customer_email DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, email FROM customers;
SELECT sale_id, total_price, purchase_date FROM ticket_sales;
SELECT total_price, purchase_date, sale_id FROM ticket_sales;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN ticket_sales ON customers.customer_id = ticket_sales.customer_id ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%' AND customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_name, total_price FROM customers JOIN ticket_sales ON customers.customer_id = ticket_sales.customer_id WHERE total_price > 100 ORDER BY total_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_quantity > 5);
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, price, event_date FROM tickets WHERE price > 50;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, event_name, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id JOIN tickets ON purchases.ticket_id = tickets.ticket_id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT purchase_id, purchase_date, total_price FROM purchases WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;

SELECT c.customer_name, t.event_name, p.total_price FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id JOIN tickets t ON p.ticket_id = t.ticket_id WHERE p.total_price > 100 ORDER BY p.total_price DESC;

SELECT t.event_name, t.event_date, c.customer_name, c.email FROM tickets t JOIN purchases p ON t.ticket_id = p.ticket_id JOIN customers c ON p.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE t.price < 50 ORDER BY t.event_date ASC, c.customer_name;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT event_name, price, available FROM tickets WHERE price > 50;
SELECT event_name, price FROM tickets WHERE available = TRUE ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT e.event_name, e.event_date, e.venue, p.quantity, p.total_price FROM events e JOIN purchases p ON e.event_id = p.ticket_id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY name;
SELECT event_name, price FROM tickets WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_quantity > 5 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, venue FROM events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT event_name, event_date, price FROM tickets ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE quantity > 2 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM tickets ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(ticket_id) AS num_tickets FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_tickets > 3;
SELECT event_name, price, available_seats FROM tickets WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC, available_seats DESC;
